Script.core:
import VR
s = 0.1 d = 0.1 kit = VR.ConstructionKit() at = kit.addAnchorType(s*0.1, [1,0,0])
r = VR.getRoot() t28 = r.find('ShapeIndexedFaceSet.28') t1 = r.find('ShapeIndexedFaceSet.1') t29 = r.find('ShapeIndexedFaceSet.29') t4 = r.find('ShapeIndexedFaceSet') t19 = r.find('ShapeIndexedFaceSet.36')
for t in [t4,t1,t19,t28,t29]: t.setPickable(True) kit.addObject(t)
kit.addObjectAnchor(t28, at, [-0.00138, -0.00065, 0.10694], d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t1, at, [-0.00122, -0.00065, 0.05019], d*0.3)
kit.addObjectAnchor(t1, at,[-0.00122,-0.00065,-0.05181], d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t29, at,[-0.00266,-0.00032,-0.11346],d*0.3)
kit.addObjectAnchor(t1, at,[-0.03472,-0.00065,0.01819],d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t19, at,[-0.11759,0.00111,0.02366],d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t1, at,[-0.03472,-0.00065,-0.02181],d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t19, at,[-0.11759,0.00111,-0.01634],d*0.3)
kit.addObjectAnchor(t1, at,[0.03228,-0.00065,0.01819],d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t4, at,[0.1101,-0.00089,0.01699],d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t1, at,[0.03228,-0.00065,-0.02181],d*0.3) kit.addObjectAnchor(t4, at,[0.1101,-0.00089,-0.01968],d*0.3)

import VR
r = VR.getRoot().find('Headlight')
werkstatt = VR.loadGeometry('models/Werkstatt.dae') wasserstrahl = VR.loadGeometry('models/Wasserstrahl.dae') penha = VR.loadGeometry('models/penha_flach.dae', True) penhazwei = VR.loadGeometry('models/penha_flach2.dae', True)
werkstatt.setPose([0,0,0],[0,-1,0],[0,0,1]) wasserstrahl.setPose([2.5,0.53,2],[0,-1,0],[0,0,-1]) penhazwei.setPose([2.3,0.55,1.9],[0,-1,0],[0,0,1]) #penha.setPose([-1.1,0.53,2],[0,-1,0],[0,0,1]) penha.setFrom([-1.1,0.53,2])
werkstatt.setScale([0.25,0.25,0.25]) wasserstrahl.setScale([0.1,0.1,0.1]) penhazwei.setScale([0.18,0.18,0.18]) #penha.setScale([0.1,0.1,0.1])
r.addChild(werkstatt) r.addChild(wasserstrahl) r.addChild(penha) r.addChild(penhazwei)

import VR name = "" p = dev.getIntersection() print p if dev.getIntersected(): name = dev.getIntersected().getName() f = dev.getIntersected().getWorldFrom() pl = [ p[i] - f[i] for i in range(3) ] print name,pl
if name == 'Plane.9': if VR.pstate >= 0: VR.pstate = -1 else: VR.pstate = 0
